column2: "Nna Temannyi Elifaz buaa dɛ
column5: Na ɔdze boka mframa ahyɛ ne yafun ma?"

column2: "Ana ɔdze kasa a mfaso nnyi ho beyi atsɛn
column3: Anaa asɛnka a orunntum mmfa nnyɛ papa biara?"

column2: "Nyew
column3: ɔwo etow Nyamesuro kyen
column4: Na isiw mpaabɔ kwan wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na w’ano kyerɛ w’emumuyɛ
column3: Na ɔwo asan mu afa enyitseweefo tɛkyerɛma."

column2: "Wankasa w’ano na obu wo fɔ
column3: na nnyɛ emi bi a; Nyew
column4: wankasa w’anofamfa na odzi dase tsia wo."

column2: "Ana ɔwo nye nyimpa a wodzii kan woo no? Anaa wɔwoo wo ansaana wɔreyɛ akoko?"
"Ana atse Nyankopɔn no nsumaa mu egyinatu? Na isianka nyansa dze ma woho yi?"
"Ebɛnadze na ɔwo inyim a hɛn yennyim? Ebɛnadze na ɔwo etse ase a ohuntsa hɛn?"
"Hwɛ etsigonfo na nkɔdaa posoposo nyina wɔ hɛn mu a Wɔyɛ mpanyin koraa sen w’egya mpo."
"Aso Nyankopɔn n’awerɛkyekyer na asɛm a wɔnye wo ka no bɔkɔɔ no
column3: suar dodow ma wo anaa?"

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na w’akoma soa wo kɔ? Na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ema w’enyiwa bubu pɛrpɛr yi?"
"Dɛ ɔwo edze w’ebufuw gu Nyankopɔn do
column3: Na ema dɛm nsɛm yi fi w’anomu ba."

column2: "Dasanyi nye woana a no ho bɛtsew? Na nyia ɔbaa awo no
column3: dɛ ɔbɛtsen?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn mmfa werɛ nnhyɛ n’akrɔnkrɔmfo mpo mu; Nyew
column4: sorsor mpo ho nntsew wɔ n’enyi do."

column2: "Na bubur nyia no ho yɛ nkɔw na ɔaprɔw
column3: Nyimpa a ɔanom emumuyɛ dɛ nsu:"

column2: "Hwɛ mebɛkyerɛ wo
column3: na ɔwo tsie me; Na dza mehu no mebɛka akyerɛ:"

column2: "Dza enyansafo aka akyerɛ a Ofi hɔn egyanom hɔ
column3: na wɔammfa ennsuma no a;"

column2: "Hɔn nko na wɔdze asaase no maa hɔn
column3: Na ɔhɔho biara enntwa mu wɔ hɔn mu:"

column2: "Nyimpa bɔn ne nda nyinara tse dɛ basia a ɔdze yaw ko awoo
column3: Na wɔdze mfe a wɔakan esie ama hyɛdofo."

column2: "Ihu ne nka gyegye n’aso mu; Prɔmprɔmyɛ mu na ɔsɛɛfo no bɛba no do:"
"Ɔnngye nndzi dɛ ɔbɛsan efi sum mu
column3: Na afona da hɔ rotweɔn no:"

column2: "Okyima hwehwɛ edziban
column3: obisa dɛ
column4: Ɔwɔ henfa? Onyim dɛ sum da bɛn ne nkyɛn:"

column2: "Ahohia na ahoguan yi no hu; Wodzi no do nyim
column3: dɛ ɔhen a oesiesie noho ama ɔko a ɔyɛ hu:"

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔatsen ne nsa etsia Nyankopɔn
column3: Na odzi nkontompɔsɛm tsia Otumfo no:"

column2: "Ɔdze kɔn a ɔasen tutu kɔ no do
column3: Ɔnye n’akyɛm ho apɔwapɔw a no mu yɛ dur no:"

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔdze ne seradze akata n’enyim
column3: Na ɔayɛ seradze nankum wɔ ne nkyɛnmu:"

column2: "Na ɔakɛtsena ekurow a woegu do
column3: Efi a nyimpa biara nntsena mu a Ɔaka no dɛ ɔndan efitu mu."

column2: "Orinnya noho
column3: nkyii so n’ahodze rinngyina
column4: Nkyii so hɔn nsowee ronnkontom mmba famu."

column2: "Orimmfi sum mu mmfi. Ogyaframee bɛma no ndubaa eguan
column3: Na n’anomu mframa bɛpra akɔ."

column2: "Mma mma ɔnntwer egyangyandze
column3: nndaadaa noho: Na egyangyandze ara na ɔbɛyɛ n’akatua."

column2: "Ɔbɛyɛ hɔ ansaana ne mber aso
column3: Na no dubaa rennyɛ frɔmfrɔm."

column2: "Ɔbɔporow n’esikyireamba bun dɛ wenyindua
column3: Na ɔapo ne nhyiren dɛ ngodua."

column2: "Na ndabrabafo fɛkuw bɛyɛ abɔnyin
column3: Na gya bɛhyew mboabagye asesee."

column2: "Wonyinsen ewurkadze
column3: na wɔwo emumuyɛ
